Functions
LR_Sound3DOnObject
Description

Plays a sound on an object by attaching a dummy object to said object. Dummy object can be deleted later to stop the sound from playing.

Parameters
_pos

The position at which to play the sound <ARRAY>

_sound

The name of the sound class (CfgSounds) <STRING>

_distance

How far away the sound can be heard from _object. <NUMBER>

_pitch

pitch of the sound. Should usually be 1. <NUMBER>

_volume

Volume of the sound. If volume above 1 sound is multiplied <NUMBER>

Return Values

Dummy object playing the sound

Examples

Nothing to see here.

Author

Mokka
